turns.user_message: Is there a way to avoid this app situation?
turns.assistant_message:
Yes, you can avoid apps by:

- Calling Uber/Lyft directly: Uber: 1-800-593-7069, Lyft: 631-201-5938
- Using traditional taxis (call local companies)
- Asking a friend/family member for a ride
- Using non-emergency medical transport services

user_profile.name: Amir Al-Hassan
user_profile.description: Amir, a 50-year-old active individual from a Middle Eastern background, enjoys expressing his creativity in various ways, despite having novice tech skills. Known for his direct communication style and impulsive decision-making, he urgently seeks transportation to a clinic for an important personal matter, motivated by a desire to ensure his health is in good standing. Although very reserved in nature, he trusts his adaptability to navigate the public space efficiently even under time constraints.
